address.street: PARK 500, 58O6 Midlothian Turnpike, North Warehouse, Doors 77/78

instructions: Invoices must be mailed with original bill of lading or transportation receipt, if applicable, to P.O. Box 26603, Richmond, VA 23261.
If Seller performs any work on Buyer's property, Seller and Seller's subcontractors, agents and employees shall comply with General Safety Regulations for Contractors (copy attached).
Purchase order number must appear on all invoices, bills of lading, cases, packing lists and correspondence.
This purchase order is exempt from the Va. State Sales Tax under exemption No. 216-028456-4 unless otherwise specified.

items.description: GRAMMER GS12 SUSPENSION SEAT WITH VINYL SEAT COVER AND OPTIONAL SEATBELT. PRICE INCLUDES INSTALLATION ON FORK TRUCKS TO BE IDENTIFIED UPON DELIVERY OF SEATS
